publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4220 David Stewart: Congratulations to Inverness City FC—That the Parliament congratulates Inverness City Football Club on winning the Scotscoup North Division Two junior league in the club’s inaugural season in that league; notes that Inverness City FC is the first amateur club in decades from the Highland capital to be part of the Scottish Junior Football Association, and wishes the club well in finding a suitable ground for next season so that they can build on this success.
S3M-4220 Congratulations to Inverness City FC (lodged on 21 May 2009) Jam ie Hepburn*
S3M-4220 Congratulations to Inverness City FC (lodged on 21 May 2009) Rhoda Grant*, Peter Peacock*
